As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. programme.desc: An underground fighter fights brutal matches to protect the widow of a man he unintentionally killed in the ring.

programme.title: Project A 2
programme.desc: Sergeant Dragon Ma discovers that his entire unit, except for Shi King, accepts bribes. Dragon is forced to confront Tiger Ow with only Shi King and three of his friends from the Marine Police.

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: The bodyguard, Michael Bryce, continues his friendship with assassin, Darius Kincaid, as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

programme.title: The Divine Move 2: The Wrathful
programme.desc: Gwi-soo loses everything at a young age due to his father's gambling in Go. Upon training for years to master the game, he confronts the masters in order to exact revenge

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: A musical drama about a wife who asks her husband to help her find her childhood sweetheart as a birthday present. Though reluctant, her husband's only choice is to set out on this journey with her.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: On his journey discovering China's history through its food, Adam arrives in Shandong - birthplace of Confucius and one of the oldest and most influential culinary traditions in China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the most fascinating Chinese provinces - Yunnan. Infused with spice and fragrance from Southeast and Central Asia, people from all around China have fallen in love with this cuisine and culture.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena explores his Canadian backyard, discovering delicious plant-based sushi, pistachio cannolis, and pizza; he gets hands-on at a vegan cheese factory with comedian Bassem Youssef.

programme.title: Stonados
programme.desc: A series of deadly stone-throwing tornadoes threaten to destroy Boston, forcing a disgraced scientist to confront his past and find a solution, before it's too late.

programme.title: Into the Cosmos: The Space Race, Mars And Beyond
programme.desc: A look at the development of space travel and the potential for humans to one day walk on the surface of Mars.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: Dramatic, moving and insightful, Armstrong tells the definitive life story of Neil Armstrong - from his childhood in rural Ohio, through aerial combat in Korea, to his first steps on the Moon - and the unwanted celebrity status that ensued.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We follow two teams of dogs as they prepare for the toughest international sled dog races in the world. Labradors trained to detect fire ants in Australia and a new way to track ringed seals in the artic - dogs.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs get trained to be sniffer dogs, protection dogs and search and rescue dogs in Austria. In the USA, dogs help to locate people trapped on the mountain and dogs who help guard the farms from wolves and coyotes.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We find out what goes on in the training of a 'general purpose dog' and how a English Springer Spaniel has the ability to sniff out one billionth of a gram of an explosive substance.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: In Malaysia, dogs are used to sniff out illegal DVDs while in UK, dogs are trained to search a fire scene and identify flammable liquids.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Italy's water resue dogs, New Zealand's search and rescue dogs and Australia's team of competitive Alaskan huskies.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Max is a part of the "Cancer and Bio-detection Dogs" team. Napal is an assistance dog in the USA and Belgium's seizure alert dog, Maybe, sends alerts to his owner before an epileptic seizure.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs in New Zealand can detect human emotions? A pet miniature Schnauzer can predict someone's death? How do dogs really communicate with each other?

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: A Staffordshire Bull Terrier Diesel who is able to locate cheetah faecal droppings. Ozzie is one of only three dogs in the world who is trained to detect poisonous Cane Toads.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: From the earliest days of space exploration to humankind's latest endeavors, risk is always part of the equation. But for the pioneers who were the first to put NASA's unpredictable technology and unproven designs to the test, the dangers were greater.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: It's one of the most challenging and dangerous phases of space exploration: bringing a spacecraft back to Earth. For decades, NASA and Soviet engineers and designers have struggled to build machines that can withstand the unforgivable heat and unthinkable speeds caused by re-entry into our atmosphere.

programme.title: Space Disasters

programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: It’s Game Show Day in the dollhouse! They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse

programme.desc: Odlulu uses the Shadow Puppet Key to create her own living shadows. When her mischievous shadows run off with the key, the Wanderers learn the only way to reattach the shadows is to touch them with the key. So, with the promise of a puppet show, they lure the shadows to the puppet theater, where they launch an epic game of tag to recapture the shadows before sunset

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: A strange new kind of butterfly is pestering the toys in Toyland – just when the Queen organises a butterfly ball. Noddy has to find out what's going on fast !

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Breeze and Roary swap places for the day (and night). Roary soon discovers the beach is no place for a racing car to live, while Breeze misses the freedom of the beach.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: The cars are all gleaming for this evening's race. Roary gets bored and heads out onto the track - with disastrous consequences. Will the cars be ready in time for the big show?

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and his friends get lost in the dark while out looking for fireflies but Raa Raa guides the way back home.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

From snow leopards to wild horses, and from alligators to elephants, China's iconic wildlife is a lot more than just pandas.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: Military veteran Wu and undercover cop Ming rescue hostages on an island near Bangkok. When Wu discovers his daughter has also been captured, he stays with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: Monkey Twins
programme.desc: After the tragic loss of his lover, Neua learns the Monkey Muay Thai skills and vows to avenge her death. His lover’s sister who practices Chinese Kung Fu, suspects Neua is responsible for her sister's death but later uncovers that she was killed by an organized crime ring. Together, they join forces to uphold justice and seek vengeance.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has post‐traumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firm’s VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)

programme.title: Petrang Kabayo 2
programme.desc: Petra transforms himself into Peter ,a businessman with many holdings. But Peter's change in status also changes his personality.

programme.title: Gaano Kadalas Ang Minsan (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Vilma was a single mother. Her only son was dying of leukemia. His only desire was to meet his father. To grant his wish, Vilma entered into an arrangement with her best friend, Hilda.

programme.title: Hawak Ko Buhay Mo
programme.desc: Ronnie Ricketts played the leader of an anti-vice squad. Two problems occupied his mind at the moment. A mysterious killer who broke the necks of his victims and a group of skinheads, who kidnapped pretty coeds to be sold to white slavery.

programme.title: Kumusta Ka Hudas
programme.desc: Mario (Rudy Fernandez) and Fidel (Ace Vergel) are best of friends since childhood. But some dissidents set-up Mario and Fidel to look like they betrayed each other. Can the two friends find it in their heart to trust each other again?

programme.title: Biktima
programme.desc: The first time their paths crossed, they are virtual enemies – Becca (Sharon Cuneta) is the relentless prosecutor while Jing (Christopher de Leon) is the jittery accused.

programme.title: Manchichiritchit
programme.desc: The reigning Queen of Comedy, Maricel Soriano, met rapper-comedian Andrew E in this delightful tale about con artists getting a heart of gold.

programme.title: Huwag Mong Itanong Kung Bakit
programme.desc: Aning (Cherie Gil) is a maid in the Cuevas household. She is raped by an unknown assailant and comes home to the province pregnant. Her older sister Dinya (Dina Bonnevie) serves the Cuevas household to search for the culprit.

programme.title: Ulo Ng Gang-Ho
programme.desc: The life story of Viyong, a notorious police from Balic-Balic, Samaloc.

programme.title: Anino Ni Asedillo
programme.desc: The legacy of the legendary hero Asedillo (Fernando Poe, Jr.) lives on. A simple school teacher who fought for the rights of others at the cost of his life. Asedillo is the role model of Simon (Conrad Poe). He becomes an active union official in the factory he is working for to lobby for workers' rights.

programme.title: Sana Bukas Pa Ang Kahapon (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three friends made their way in the big city. In the end they all thought of the things they should never have done, wondering what might have been had these tomorrows been their yesterdays.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: This is the story of four women in the glamorous world of fashion, about their friendships, their loves, and their careers.

programme.title: Kasalanan Bang Sambahin Ka
programme.desc: As a last fling before getting married, Alex (Julio Diaz) dates his friend's cousin Catherine (Vivian Velez). When Alex still marries his fiancee Grace (Dawn Zulueta), Catherine makes life difficult by creating a scandal.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 10
programme.desc: The death of a young botanist leads the CBI team into the lucrative world of medical marijuana, while reunites with former girlfriend and CI, Summer Edgecombe (SAMAIRE ARMSTRONG).

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson’s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one word—SHAZAM!—this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heart—inside a ripped, godlike body—Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But he’ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).

programme.title: Journey To The Center Of The Earth
programme.desc: During a scientific expedition to Iceland, scientist Trevor Anderson (Fraser-- Crash, The Mummy), his nephew Sean (Josh Hutcherson) and their local guide, Hannah (Anita Briem), are trapped in a cave -- from which their only escape is to go deeper, into unimagined worlds, where the trio comes face to face with never-before-seen creatures and harrowing dangers as they race an building volcanic eruption to reach the surface!

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Taking place 10 years after his heroic defeat of the Kraken, Perseus (Sam Worthington) embarks on a treacherous quest into the underworld to rescue his father, overthrow the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 21
programme.desc: After one of his favorite TV shows gets canceled too soon, Sheldon feels lost, so Amy tries to help him get over his compulsive need for closure.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 22
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon hire Professor Proton (guest star BOB NEWHART), the host of their favorite childhood TV show to perform. Raj leaves his dog with Howard and Bernadette.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 23
programme.desc: When the girls' trip to Vegas falls through, the guys invite them to a Dungeons & Dragons date night.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 24
programme.desc: On the sixth season finale, Sheldon and Penny are thrown for a loop when Leonard is offered an exciting new job opportunity overseas.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: The guys head to Orlando, where they are out of line with theme park guests, get wet on a river adventure and manage the (mis)information booth. Plus, the loser goes from spider hero to barnyard zero.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 14
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Joe and Q say aloha in a fun Hawaiian episode! The future looks hazy when the guys pose as fortune tellers and practice indecent proposals at a romantic waterfall. Plus, it's blood in the water for the big loser.

programme.title: Friends S5 15
programme.desc: Chandler thinks Monica wants more from their relationship. Ross fails to impress his new neighbors.

programme.title: Friends S5 16
programme.desc: After Phoebe finds a police badge, she uses it to do good deeds. Joey worries that he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends S5 17
programme.desc: Rachel interviews for a great job but she may get it for the wrong reason. Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebe's.

programme.title: Friends S5 18
programme.desc: Rachel starts smoking when she realizes that her boss and co-workers at her new job are smokers. Monica and Phoebe plan a surprise birthday party for Rachel. Joey and Ben audition for a commercial.

programme.title: Friends S5 19
programme.desc: Ross' flirting technique fails to impress a pizza-delivery woman. A surprise awaits Joey when he tells everyone about his big television appearance.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 01
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin return with an explosion of brand new hacks! Tonight, they cook lasagna in a dishwasher, go back in time to discover some of history's earliest hacks, and learn how to hack breakfast using power tools.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 02
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin find out if an electrocuted hot dog is hack or wack, welcome socks to the all-star club, and learn how a bra is really a hack from history. And there's a new doctor in town with his own hacks to save the day.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 03
programme.desc: Our dynamic duo discovers how to hack vodka to taste like top shelf, explores the origin of gin and tonic with Hacks from History, and welcomes a tennis ball into the exclusive All Star club.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 04
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke host the ultimate Battle of the Bags by discovering the best hacks for carrying groceries. Plus, they welcome rubber gloves to the All Star Club and explore hacks from the original Hack Master: Benjamin Franklin.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: The guys head to Orlando, where they are out of line with theme park guests, get wet on a river adventure and manage the (mis)information booth. Plus, the loser goes from spider hero to barnyard zero.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 14
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Joe and Q say aloha in a fun Hawaiian episode! The future looks hazy when the guys pose as fortune tellers and practice indecent proposals at a romantic waterfall. Plus, it's blood in the water for the big loser.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 9
programme.desc: The CBI team investigates the murder of a real estate agent with former gang ties, while Jane searches for leads on his new connection to Red John.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 10
programme.desc: The death of a young botanist leads the CBI team into the lucrative world of medical marijuana, while reunites with former girlfriend and CI, Summer Edgecombe (SAMAIRE ARMSTRONG).

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: The winner of 11 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, Best Director and Best Actor, Ben-Hur stands as one of the greatest Hollywood epics ever filmed.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Academy Award nominees Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou join Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly in this action drama from Ed Zwick, the filmmaker behind The Last Samurai. DiCaprio stars as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war; Hounsou (Gladiator), as a desperate father searching for his lost son; and Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), as a reporter searching for the truth behind the trade in 'conflict diamonds.' Forced to confront the brutal human cost of the diamond trade, Archer changes his search for financial reward to a quest for redemption.

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Stone Age Earth: In the presence of a mysterious black obelisk, pre-humans discover the use of tools--and weapons--violently taking first steps toward intelligence. 1999: On Earth's moon astronauts uncover another mysterious black obelisk. 2001: Between Earth and Jupiter, the spacecraft's intelligent computer makes a mistake that kills most of the human crew--then continues to kill to hide its error. Beyond Time: The sole survivor of the journey to Jupiter ascends to the next level of humanity.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: A kung fu prodigy trains with two legends to face a new rival in an epic martial arts showdown.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior (Season 14)
programme.desc: A new generation of ninjas continue at the Tacoma Dome. Taking on the course, competitors as young as 15 compete and will face up to six challenging obstacles, including new obstacle Double Down in addition to the iconic Warped Wall.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex (Season 7)
programme.desc: After a man is stabbed by an intruder who left no trace of a break-in, Rex’s senses reveal it was only a practice run for a scheme that goes much deeper.

programme.title: The Rainmaker (Season 1)
programme.desc: Rudy and Deck have a tense encounter with a witness and make a crucial discovery about their client.

programme.title: The Hunting Party (Season 1)
programme.desc: A massive explosion at a top-secret prison known as the Pit allows notorious serial killer Richard Harris to escape.

programme.title: Boston Blue (Season 1)
programme.desc: NYPD detective Danny Reagan teams up with Boston detective Lena Silver to investigate a deadly fire at a tech company. As they dig deeper, they uncover a web of secrets involving facial recognition technology, family ties and a search for justice.

programme.title: NCIS: Origins (Season 2)
programme.desc: Gibbs and Franks investigate the disappearance of a young Marine connected to a mysterious compound with a charismatic leader, and Lala’s fate is revealed.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Dominion
programme.desc: With Earth once again dominated by prehistoric predators, two generations of heroes must unite for a globe-spanning adventure to shape the destiny of humans and dinosaurs.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: Tom Cruise and Morgan Freeman star in this groundbreaking event about a lone repairmen on a near-ruined future Earth who finds himself questioning all he knows in a fight to save humanity.

programme.title: Cyril: Simply Magic
programme.desc: Join Cyril on a journey of self-discovery in various locations across Asia as he shares the marvels of his magic.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (Season 14)
programme.desc: Erin is designated to lead a federal investigation into corrupt horse racing.

programme.title: The Blacklist (Season 10)
programme.desc: A cryptic tip from Red leads the task force to uncover a security breach within the U.S. government; Congressman Hudson takes major steps to uncover the inner workings of the task force.

programme.title: The Blacklist (Season 10)
programme.desc: Cooper is caught on the defensive when summoned by the Attorney General. Red visits dear friends.

programme.title: Buster Has a Wobbly Tooth!
programme.desc: Buster has a wobbly tooth! He gets it after being hit with a football & he & his friends race to the dentist.

programme.title: It's Time To Sing Along
programme.desc: Get ready to sing! This is a non-stop musical party, as Baby John & his family turn every moment of their day into a joyful song.

programme.title: Love Your Family
programme.desc: It’s all about family! Join Baby John as he spends a wonderful day singing about his love & appreciation for his mommy, daddy, & siblings.

programme.title: A Day Out With Family
programme.desc: It’s a perfect day for a family outing! Join Baby John & his family as they go on a special trip to the park for a picnic & fun games.

programme.title: A Day With Mila!
programme.desc: Join Mila for a day of amazing adventures where her magic pet, Morphle, transforms into anything she needs to help friends & solve problems.

programme.title: Cop Car Caper
programme.desc: Officer Morphle is on the case! He must stop a series of troublemakers, including a giant baby, a runaway globe, & a group of pesky bandits.

programme.title: Barky Walkies
programme.desc: A city-wide search for the Mayor's lost dog, Barky, gets complicated when Morphle & Mila must also stop the mischievous Bandits along the way.

programme.title: Amazing Adventures!
programme.desc: It's time for amazing adventures! Tilly the tow truck gets sick, Weasel causes a cake catastrophe & Blue Mechanical gets lost.

programme.title: Thankful Pie
programme.desc: The team bakes a thankful pie for Grandma! They also have to catch a runaway tire, rescue a boat with a tow rope & play a game of football.

programme.title: A Great Day at the Garage!
programme.desc: It’s a busy day at the garage! From messy cement mixers to trucks with flat tires, Gecko has his hands full fixing his friends.

programme.title: Quiet Time
programme.desc: It's time for quiet time. Baby John learns about the skeleton in his body, the family sleeps in one big bed & they all go on an adventure to the moon.

programme.title: Bedtime Songs With JJ
programme.desc: The sun is setting, & it’s time for bed. Follow JJ’s calming evening routine as he gets ready to drift off to sleep.

programme.title: Sing Along With Cody!
programme.desc: Sing along with Cody! He moves to a new house, feels better after having a bad dream & learns that saying "goodbye" isn't forever.

programme.title: Sing Along With JJ and Friends!
programme.desc: Sing along with JJ & friends! Build a giant pillow fort, go on a camper van vacation & learn how to make the perfect PB&J sandwich.

programme.title: Dance To Your Favourite Songs
programme.desc: It's time to dance to your favorite songs! Do the silly animal dance, dance like a ballerina & see a cow jump over the moon.

programme.title: Singing Fun
programme.desc: It's time for singing fun! Learn about sneezing, do the "Looby Loo," & play some silly April Fool's jokes.

programme.title: Amazing Animals
programme.desc: It’s a wild adventure with Baby John! He's visiting the farm & the zoo to meet & learn about all sorts of amazing animals.

programme.title: Time To Play
programme.desc: It's time to play! The friends have fun at an indoor playground, Jill has her first parade & the family plays with colorful balloons.

programme.title: Vehicles and Animals
programme.desc: It's a day of vehicles & animals! Max gets a DIY fire engine, the family rides the big red bus & mealtime is fun with pretend animal sounds.

programme.title: Shake Your Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Let's shake your little baby bum! The friends have a dance party, learn a calming breathing song & play in the sandpit.

programme.title: Get Ready to Sing Along
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along! Miss Polly's dolly is sick, the family goes on a sleepy bus ride & the friends make their own instruments.

programme.title: JJ's Magical Carousel Ride!
programme.desc: Go on a magical carousel ride with JJ! Become a brave knight, blast off in a rocketship & solve the mystery of who took the cookie.

programme.title: JJ is Having a Dance Party!
programme.desc: JJ is having a dance party! Count down with five little dinosaurs, visit a pumpkin patch & sing "Happy & You Know It" in Italian.

programme.title: Fun Vehicles With JJ!
programme.desc: Let's go for a ride! Join JJ as he learns about the big wheels on the bus & explores all sorts of other amazing vehicles.

programme.title: Baby Chaos
programme.desc: Arpo is on baby duty, but this is no ordinary baby! From super-strength to unexpected transformations, Arpo has his hands full keeping the baby safe.

programme.title: Adventures With ARPO
programme.desc: Arpo's adventures take him from the backyard to the far reaches of his imagination, facing everything from aliens to giant vegetables.

programme.title: ARPO Has a Crazy Day
programme.desc: Arpo's day is a whirlwind of crazy challenges, from runaway ice cream trucks to mischievous baby antics.

programme.title: Exercise Is Fun!
programme.desc: Let's get moving! Baby John discovers how fun exercise can be through a series of energetic games, dances, & outdoor activities.

programme.title: Playtime
programme.desc: It’s time to play! Baby John is having a fun-filled day at the playground, where he learns how to share, take turns, & make new friends.

programme.title: Let's Do What the Animals Do!
programme.desc: Let's do what the animals do! The kids pretend to be their favorite animals, learn about opposites at the zoo & get a new pet chameleon.

programme.title: Clawed Away
programme.desc: Mysterious flying objects cause chaos! Mila & Morphle must stop a UFO with a giant claw while also dealing with Orphle's troublesome magic cloud.

programme.title: Baby Morphles!
programme.desc: A day of helping babies gets chaotic when Mila & Morphle must catch a runaway carriage & also manage a whole group of mischievous baby Morphles.

programme.title: Grow Your Own Veggies
programme.desc: Mila & Morphle's day of gardening & baking is thrown into chaos by magic seeds & Orphle's out-of-control construction digger.

programme.title: If You're Happy Sing Along
programme.desc: If you're happy, sing along! Join in with "Little Bunny Foo Foo," sing about the animals on Old MacDonald's farm & play with five little animals.

programme.title: ABC's and Counting With JJ
programme.desc: Learning is an adventure! Sing your way through the alphabet with JJ, & then count to ten with some very friendly dinosaurs.

programme.title: Fun times with JJ!
programme.desc: It's a playdate with JJ! Join him for a day of classic games & songs.

programme.title: Fun and Play At the Garage
programme.desc: It's fun & playtime at the garage! The team rescues Weasel from a blimp, takes an imaginary trip to outer space & has a wacky waterslide party.

programme.title: A Great Day at the Garage!
programme.desc: It’s a busy day at the garage! From messy cement mixers to trucks with flat tires, Gecko has his hands full fixing his friends.

programme.title: Baby Trucks Great Adventures!
programme.desc: Baby Truck's love for adventure leads him into a muddy mess! Can his friends work together to rescue him from the sticky situation?

programme.title: It's Playtime!
programme.desc: It's playtime! The friends learn to be safe at daycare, play a game of "Red Light, Green Light," & have fun in the rain.

programme.title: Let's Be Healthy!
programme.desc: It’s time to learn about being healthy! Baby John discovers the importance of eating his veggies, washing his hands, & visiting the doctor.

programme.title: Getting Ready To Go Out!
programme.desc: Let's get ready to go out! Baby John learns to tie his shoes, find his missing socks & gets a cool new pair of light-up shoes.

programme.title: Sing Along To Your Favourites
programme.desc: Let's sing along to your favorites! Max gets his first bath, Mia & Max play peek-a-boo & the friends learn all about shapes on a train ride.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 291
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 4
programme.desc: The ride takes a dramatic turn when Bhaskar totals the support car. With Ridermania just days away, Jess and the team scramble to salvage their journey.

programme.title: Great Australian Walks - Uluru and Kata Tjuta
programme.desc: Julia Zemirio heads to Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park in a journey to the sacred heart of Australia to discover the significance Indigenous and non-indigenous Australians put on this ancient place.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Episode 33
programme.desc: Inspiring, entertaining and full of practical advice, join Costa Georgiadis and the team as they unearth gardening ideas, meet avid gardeners and look at some of the most inspiring gardens from across the country.

programme.title: Ambulance Australia - Episode 5
programme.desc: It's a quiet start at the Brisbane Operation Centre. Operator Harrison fears this is the calm before the storm and sure enough, it soon becomes a busy day with a range of medical emergencies that put the team to the test.

programme.desc: Join John Barron and Chas Licciardello as they take a deeper look at the people, issues and politics driving America this week. Plus longer interviews and in-depth discussions on the second Trump presidency.

programme.desc: Johnson Raela brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: After a young woman is found dead in her bathtub, the investigation focuses in on her estranged husband and her boyfriend. An unexpected digital clue has one of them confessing to the murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Social media influencer Alexis Murphy was on her way to a hair appointment, but never arrived. When a photo of her abandoned car was posted online, her worried loved-ones knew something was terribly wrong.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Kerry Lyn Dalton was sentenced to death for the torture and murder of Irene "Melanie" May. And because Melanie was a meth addict with no fixed address, police did little to investigate her disappearance.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Elizabeth Thomas Story with Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: Five years after she was groomed and abducted by the most popular teacher in school, Elizabeth Thomas shares new revelations about her ordeal, with famed kidnapping survivor Elizabeth Smart.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A boater goes off the deep end; a naked man causes traffic chaos; a police uniform-swiper gets taken to the cleaners; and more!

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A handcuffed defendant attacks her lawyer; a sex offender's mom takes offense at his bail hearing; a judge dresses down a panty thief; and more.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A young father and his family come under attack at a busy drive-thru. Terrified of his aggravated assailant, he fires his gun and allegedly injures an innocent bystander.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's disappearance shook a small town, and skull fractures point to murder.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: A Mobile mother goes missing after blowing millions at the casino. At trial, the DA and detective take a gamble of their own to bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an up-and-coming defense attorney is murdered in her office, her colleagues vow to seek justice and "make this right."

programme.desc: When Hazel procrastinates on a science fair project, Cosmo and Wanda rewrite the laws of science to make it work. // When Hazel's landlord goes missing, she makes a wish to get to the bottom of the case!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Sergio enlists Adelaide's help to become a gentleman in order to win Priscilla back! // Rosa hears an Ernesto Estrella prediction that Maria and Arturo could get back together - could it be true?

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne doesn't believe in an astrological prediction that 'love will find her,' until it seems to come true.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob meets a magical fish. // SpongeBob cooks in the big leagues.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Lady Upturn introduces Squidward, and his musical "talents", to her high society friends after she becomes his patron. // Squidward sets out to prove that aliens aren't real...until he has a close encounter of his own.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. Suddenly, a real supervillain emerges and puts Max and Chloe in serious danger.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: ShoutOut has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to sell a movie to Hollywood bigshot Deuce Van Nuys, but when her mind goes blank under the pressure, the rest of Danger Force pitch in and share their own epic--and epically bad--movie ideas.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Charlotte's invention for The Gizmo Show is accidentally destroyed and then rebuilt, Charlotte worries that the attention she gets could expose Kid Danger and Captain Man’s secret identity.

programme.desc: Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down. // Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.desc: Ronnie Anne lands the internship of a lifetime with Bruno, but will she be able to hang? // Dreaming of DJ-ing at the Gatos halftime show, Carl goes undercover with Alexis and the school band!

programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together. // When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.desc: Jack's new friend Beef invites him to a sleepover. Jack, a sleepover newb, freaks out over impressing his new friend. // Jack & Lil try to prove they're the one true local, enduring a series of bizarre quests in the local dive restaurant Dead Ed's.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur, Cosmo and Wanda bring a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period to present day. // Hazel wishes Jasmine was fearless, but the wish goes awry when Jasmine's fears escape and invade the school!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes her apartment building were a luxury hotel for a sleepover, but finds herself too busy to enjoy it with friends. // When Hazel's wish for 1,500 minutes of fame angers Principal Krentz, she must find a way to speed up time.

programme.desc: Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show. // Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Two familiar faces from SpongeBob's past visit Bikini Bottom, but they bring a big problem along with them. // After falling down the drain, Plankton finds an unlikely ally in the sewers.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Strange things start to happen to Bose when he finds himself in love with an alien.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Charlotte's invention for The Gizmo Show is accidentally destroyed and then rebuilt, Charlotte worries that the attention she gets could expose Kid Danger and Captain Man’s secret identity.

programme.desc: After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking he's a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.desc: SpongeBob and Plankton must work together to survive an island of deadly monsters. // SpongeBob teaches Patrick how to ride a bike.

programme.desc: SpongeBob celebrates the anniversary of his friendship with Squidward. Squidward does not. // Squidward's lack of talent lands him in a court ordered music class.
